author: Jesse Pound
title: BMO gives clients stocks for the long term to buy during the turmoil
description: The firm tapped their analysts for every sector to provide picks and outlooks for how their industries have been changed by the virus.
content:
(This story is for CNBC Pro subscribers only). 
As politicians and public health officials work to figure out how to re-open the United States economy, investors should start to take a look at how stocks will perform long-term once the coronavirus crisis pas… [+433 chars]
